Tools

I want to…

  • Ask questions and learn more:
    • Slack
  • Create an AWS Cloudformation stack:
    • Amazonia
  • Keep my code in version control:
    • Github - for public repositories
    • Bitbucket - for private repositories
  • Use a continuous delivery pipeline:
    • Travis - for Github repositories
    • Bitbucket Pipelines - for Bitbucket repositories
  • Monitor my AWS infrastructure:
    • ELK - general logging and monitoring for all services
    • Cloudsploit-Lambda - run regular security audits on your AWS space
  • Make my AWS space more secure:
    • space-provisioner - configure your AWS space to a minimum level of security

This project is maintained by GA Autobots.

The theme is based on DOCter from CFPB.
